name: Dark Kael

skills.name: Weaver of Woes
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 3 times. Each hit has a 25% chance to instantly activate 2 [Poison] debuffs or 1 [Poison] debuff and 1 [HP Burn] debuff.

effects.notes: Each hit: 25% chance to instantly activate 2 Poison debuffs or 1 Poison and 1 HP Burn debuff.

skills.notes: Instant activation of debuffs is unique and powerful for boss fights.

skills.name: Binding Darkness
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Has a 75% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff for 2 turns. Each critical hit also has a 75% chance of increasing the duration of all the debuffs on the target by 1 turn.

effects.notes: 75% chance to place 50% Decrease ATK for 2 turns.
Each crit: 75% chance to increase duration of all debuffs on target by 1 turn.

skills.notes: Debuff extension is conditional on crits.

skills.name: Reality Acid
skills.description: Has a 75% chance of placing three 5% [Poison] debuffs and a 25% [Poison Sensitivity] debuff for 2 turns.

effects.notes: 75% chance to place three 5% Poison debuffs for 2 turns.
75% chance to place 25% Poison Sensitivity for 2 turns.

skills.notes: High value for boss fights and poison teams.

skills.name: Delerium
skills.description: Decreases the C.RATE of enemies under 2 or more [Poison] debuffs by 15%. If there are multiple Champions on the team with this Skill, only one will activate.

effects.notes: Decreases C.RATE of enemies under 2+ Poison debuffs by 15%.

skills.notes: Unique passive, only one instance active per team.

forms.comments: Dark Kael is a top-tier poisoner and debuff extender for Clan Boss, Dungeons, and Doom Tower. His A1 can instantly activate poisons and HP Burn, and his A2 extends debuffs on crit.

stat_priorities: Clan Boss: SPD, ACC, HP%, DEF%
Doom Tower: ACC, SPD, HP%, DEF%

clan_boss: Offense: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Single Out, Bring it Down, Methodical, GIANT SLAYER (A1 3-hit attack - 30% proc per hit = ~66% total proc chance per A1 use for massive MAX HP damage)

Support: Steadfast (+810 HP), Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, Swarm Smiter (A1 3-hit synergy), Evil Eye (TM control from allies), Lore of Steel, Master Hexer (CRITICAL - extends Poison/HP Burn/Dec ATK from A1/A2/A3 for 2→3 turns, MASSIVE synergy with entire kit), Cycle of Magic (cooldown cycling for A2/A3 spam), Eagle Eye (CRITICAL +50 ACC for Poison/Dec ATK consistency - 250+ ACC needed)
Defense: Improved Parry, Bloodthirst, Delay Death (survivability)
NOTE: A2 debuff extension requires 100% C.RATE - prioritize Deadly Precision + Keen Strike + Heart of Glory + gear C.RATE for consistent debuff extension
dungeons: Offense: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Single Out, Bring it Down, Methodical, GIANT SLAYER (A1 3-hit multi-proc - 30% per hit = ~66% total proc chance, excellent for boss damage)

Support: Steadfast, Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, Swarm Smiter (A1 3-hit), Evil Eye (TM control), Lore of Steel, Master Hexer (CRITICAL - Poison/HP Burn/Dec ATK extension 2→3 turns), Cycle of Magic (A2/A3 spam), Eagle Eye (CRITICAL +50 ACC - 250+ ACC total)
Defense: Improved Parry, Bloodthirst, Delay Death (survivability)
arena: Offense: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Single Out, Cycle of Violence (Arena farm), Kill Streak (Arena farm), Bring it Down, Methodical, GIANT SLAYER (A1 3-hit)

Support: Steadfast, Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, Swarm Smiter (A1 3-hit), Evil Eye (TM control), Lore of Steel (Speed set boost), Master Hexer (debuff extension), Cycle of Magic, Eagle Eye (+50 ACC for 250+ total)
Defense: Improved Parry, Bloodthirst, Delay Death
doom_tower: Offense: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Single Out, Bring it Down, Methodical, GIANT SLAYER (A1 3-hit multi-proc for boss damage)

Support: Steadfast, Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, Swarm Smiter (A1 3-hit), Evil Eye (TM control), Lore of Steel, Master Hexer (CRITICAL - Poison/HP Burn/Dec ATK extension 2→3 turns), Cycle of Magic (A2/A3 spam), Eagle Eye (CRITICAL +50 ACC - 250+ ACC for Hard)
Defense: Improved Parry, Bloodthirst, Delay Death, Unshakeable (debuff RES for boss survivability)
faction_wars: Offense: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Single Out, Bring it Down, Methodical, GIANT SLAYER (A1 3-hit)

Support: Steadfast, Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, Swarm Smiter (A1 3-hit), Evil Eye (TM control), Lore of Steel, Master Hexer (CRITICAL - Poison/HP Burn/Dec ATK extension), Cycle of Magic (A2/A3 spam), Eagle Eye (+50 ACC for Poison consistency)
Defense: Improved Parry, Bloodthirst, Delay Death (survivability)
general: PRIORITY OFFENSE T6: GIANT SLAYER (A1 'Weaver of Woes' attacks 1 enemy 3 times - 30% proc per hit = ~66% total proc chance per A1 use for massive MAX HP damage on bosses). Warmaster is INCORRECT for Dark Kael due to multi-hit A1.

PRIORITY SUPPORT T6: Master Hexer (CRITICAL - extends Poison/HP Burn/Dec ATK debuffs from 2→3 turns. MASSIVE synergy with entire kit: A1 instantly activates Poison/HP Burn, A2 places Dec ATK + extends debuffs on crit, A3 places 3x Poison + Poison Sensitivity). Eagle Eye (CRITICAL +50 ACC for Poison/Dec ATK consistency - need 250+ ACC Clan Boss/Doom Tower Hard).

KEY MASTERIES: Giant Slayer (A1 3-hit multi-proc), Master Hexer (CRITICAL - entire kit is debuff-based, extends Poison/HP Burn/Dec ATK 2→3 turns for 50% more damage/utility), Eagle Eye (ACC for Poison/Dec ATK), Swarm Smiter (A1 3-hit synergy), Deadly Precision + Keen Strike + Heart of Glory (CRITICAL for 100% C.RATE builds - A2 debuff extension requires crit), Cycle of Magic (A2/A3 spam).

SYNERGIES: A1 attacks 3 times (each hit 1.35x ATK) - 25% chance per hit (45% booked) to instantly activate 2 Poison debuffs OR 1 Poison + 1 HP Burn debuff (UNIQUE mechanic, massive boss damage). A2 AoE places Dec ATK (75% base, 100% booked) + on crit, 75% chance to extend ALL debuffs on target by 1 turn (requires 100% C.RATE for consistency). A3 places 3x Poison (5% each) + Poison Sensitivity 25% for 2 turns (75% base, 100% booked). Passive decreases enemy C.RATE by 15% if under 2+ Poison debuffs (defensive utility). Master Hexer extends ALL debuffs (Poison, HP Burn, Dec ATK, Poison Sensitivity) from 2→3 turns.

BUILD REQUIREMENTS: 100% C.RATE (CRITICAL for A2 debuff extension on crit), 220+ SPD, 250+ ACC (with Eagle Eye for Clan Boss/Doom Tower Hard), HP%/DEF% for survivability. Deadly Precision + Keen Strike + Heart of Glory masteries help reach 100% C.RATE with gear.

UNIQUE MECHANICS: A1 INSTANTLY ACTIVATES Poison/HP Burn debuffs (bypasses tick mechanics for immediate boss damage - excellent for Hydra, Clan Boss, Spider, Doom Tower bosses). A2 extends ALL debuffs on crit (not just Poison - extends HP Burn, Dec ATK, Dec DEF, etc. if present). Passive C.RATE reduction stacks with team debuffs for defensive utility.

DARK ELVES FACTION WARS: Top-tier poisoner/debuffer (10/10 rating). User's Dark Elf Near Completion (Normal) - excellent for completing Normal and progressing Hard. Poison damage bypasses enemy tankiness.

CLAN BOSS/DOOM TOWER: Meta poisoner (Clan Boss 9/10, Doom Tower 9/10). Master Hexer + A1 instant activation + A2 debuff extension = sustained Poison/HP Burn damage. Build for 220+ SPD (speed-tuned), 250+ ACC, 100% C.RATE, HP%/DEF%.

update_notes.last_patch: MAJOR UPDATE: CREATED complete masteries section from scratch (was entirely missing). KEY ADDITIONS: GIANT SLAYER (A1 'Weaver of Woes' attacks 3 times - 30% proc per hit = ~66% total proc chance per A1 for massive MAX HP damage), Master Hexer (CRITICAL - extends Poison/HP Burn/Dec ATK from 2→3 turns, MASSIVE synergy with entire debuff-based kit), Eagle Eye (CRITICAL +50 ACC for Poison/Dec ATK consistency - 250+ ACC needed), Deadly Precision + Keen Strike + Heart of Glory (CRITICAL for 100% C.RATE builds - A2 debuff extension requires crit for 75% chance to extend ALL debuffs by 1 turn), Swarm Smiter (A1 3-hit synergy), Cycle of Magic (A2/A3 spam). UNIQUE MECHANICS: A1 INSTANTLY ACTIVATES Poison/HP Burn debuffs (25% base, 45% booked per hit - bypasses tick mechanics for immediate boss damage, excellent for Hydra/Clan Boss/Spider/Doom Tower). A2 extends ALL debuffs on crit (not just Poison - extends HP Burn, Dec ATK, Dec DEF if present - 75% chance per crit, requires 100% C.RATE for consistency). A3 places 3x Poison (5% each) + Poison Sensitivity 25% (75% base, 100% booked). Passive decreases enemy C.RATE by 15% if under 2+ Poison debuffs. Master Hexer extends ALL debuffs from 2→3 turns. BUILD REQUIREMENTS: 100% C.RATE (A2 debuff extension), 220+ SPD (speed-tuned), 250+ ACC (with Eagle Eye), HP%/DEF% for survivability. Dark Elves Faction Wars 10/10 (user Near Completion Normal - excellent for completing/progressing Hard). Clan Boss 9/10, Doom Tower 9/10, Dungeons 10/10 meta poisoner/debuffer. Added mechanics_advisory notes.

notes: Dark Kael is a top-tier meta poisoner and debuff extender (Clan Boss 9/10, Dungeons 10/10, Doom Tower 9/10, Faction Wars 10/10, Arena 8/10). A1 INSTANTLY ACTIVATES Poison/HP Burn debuffs for immediate boss damage (unique mechanic). A2 extends ALL debuffs on crit (requires 100% C.RATE for consistency). Master Hexer CRITICAL for extending all debuffs 2→3 turns. Build for 100% C.RATE, 220+ SPD, 250+ ACC (with Eagle Eye), HP%/DEF% for survivability. User's Dark Elf Near Completion (Normal) - excellent for completing Normal and progressing Hard Faction Wars.
